title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The teacher seems strict and I want to earn good discipline points.

action: Maintain proper posture while observing teacher for cues about daily pledge

action: Stand up for the pledge with proper posture, right hand over heart

action: Complete pledge recitation and sit down properly while observing teacher's evaluation of the class
thoughts: The pledge is complete now. I need to make sure I follow all procedures correctly - sitting down quietly and maintaining proper posture. I should watch how the teacher evaluates our performance to understand what behavior earns positive marks.
memory: Observed teacher evaluating class compliance after pledge
Maintained proper seating posture to avoid disciplinary marks
